sentences.en: Celia tried countering antagonism with a smile.
sentences.cn: 西莉亚力图用笑容对待敌意.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Xinqin granule do have the antagonism to histamine.
sentences.cn: 结论: 辛芩颗粒对过敏性介质组织胺有确定的对抗作用.

sentences.en: He felt a strong antagonism towards his immediate superior.
sentences.cn: 他对他的顶头上司怀着强烈的敌意.

sentences.en: Her lips tightened. The feeling of mutual antagonism was increased.
sentences.cn: 她的嘴唇紧闭着,双方的敌对情绪增加了.

sentences.en: It may be regarded as an example of antagonism.
Let us examine both sides of this antagonism.
sentences.cn: 让我们来看看这种对立的两个方面吧.

sentences.en: Peter sensed an instant antagonism between Marsha and Christine.
sentences.cn: 彼得立刻感到玛莎和克丽丝汀之间有一种敌对情绪.

sentences.en: Property, in its present form , is based on the antagonism of capital and wage - labour.
sentences.cn: 现今的这种财产是在资本和雇佣劳动的对立中运动的.

sentences.en: The antagonism he felt towards his old enemy was still very strong.
sentences.cn: 他对宿敌的仇恨仍然十分强烈。

sentences.en: The antagonism he felt towards his old enemy was still very strong.
sentences.cn: 他对旧冤家的敌对情绪仍然很大.

sentences.en: Their antagonism has formed in all ages a part of the philosophic atmosphere of the time.
sentences.cn: 他们的对抗性就会在各个时代中形成当时哲学空气的一部分.

sentences.en: There is still much antagonism between environmental groups and the oil companies.
sentences.cn: 环境组织与石油公司之间仍有很多敌意。

sentences.en: There is still much antagonism between trades unions and the oil companies.
sentences.cn: 工会和石油公司之间仍然存在着相当大的敌意。

sentences.en: With urbanisation the antagonism between rich and poor sharpened.
sentences.cn: 伴随着城市化的推进，贫富间的对立情绪也加剧了。

sentences.en: You could sense the antagonism between them.
sentences.cn: 你能觉察出他们之间有对立情绪.

words.tran_cn: 敌对的；对抗性的；反对的
敌手；[解剖] 对抗肌；[生化] 拮抗物；反协同试剂
使…敌对；使…对抗；对…起反作用

trans.tran_en: hatred between people or groups of people
